title: "OctaiPipe releases version 2.0 of its Federated Learning Operations (FL-Ops) platform for Critical Infrastructure on-device AI"
excerpt: "As part of the development of version 2.0, OctaiPipe engaged an external penetration testing team to robustly and independently verify the security of all platform components. An enforced TLS certificate is now deployed on OctaiPipe’s Rest API and automated penetration tests are now an integral part of OctaiPipe’s continuous build process."
